title: The Moment is Now: In Dialogue with Changemakers featuring Danté Stewart

media:group.media:title: The Moment is Now: In Dialogue with Changemakers featuring Danté Stewart
media:group.media:description:
Recording of the inaugural event of "The Moment is Now: In Dialogue with Changemakers". The minister, essayist, and cultural critic Danté Stewart will join Provost Renée T. White for a discussion and reading from Stewart’s book Shoutin’ in the Fire: An American Epistle (Convergent Books, October 2021).

Programmed by Provost Renée T. White, this series features prominent and emerging scholars, thinkers, artists, and practitioners across disciplines that bring about positive change in the world and connect with the university’s academic strengths and mission. With a focus on exploring and addressing current topics in art, politics, race, and culture, this series provides an opportunity for students, faculty, staff, and the general.

For more information about our event visit: https://events.newschool.edu/
